categorys.map:
(doc) ->
 if doc.doc_type is 'productDoc'
  emit doc.category, 
  {
   barcode: doc.barcode
   name: doc.name
   quantity: doc.quantity
   description: doc.description
   tags: doc.tags
   category: doc.category
  }

tags.map:
(doc) ->
 if doc.doc_type is 'productDoc'
  for i in doc.tags
   result = {
    barcode: doc.barcode
    name: doc.name
    quantity: doc.quantity
    description: doc.description
    tags: doc.tags
    category: doc.category
   }
   emit i, result
